commit.message:
emit-rtl.c (set_mem_attributes_minus_bitpos): Adjust SIZE as well as OFFSET for BITPOS.

        * emit-rtl.c (set_mem_attributes_minus_bitpos): Adjust SIZE
        as well as OFFSET for BITPOS.

files.patch:
